Articles.Content:
Due to the inevitability of changes in manufacturer part specifications the UHLV II series of vehicles are no longer a viable method of transport.

On behalf of KerbCo. Aeronautics & Space Division, I present to you the UHLV III series:

The rocket itself is powered by four individually stabilized Primary Lift Units, each carrying over 10,000 units of fuel and a single BFE series engine rated at 1200 thrust, coupled to the central Payload Bus Unit providing an all liquid fueled approach to heavy lifting.

The UHLV IIIb Variant features solid rocket booster assists for massive increases in off-the-pad lifting capacity.

Here you can see a slightly modified version of the UHLV IIIb attempting to loft a payload of 80 tons of fuel (2000 units).

Addons used:

Sunday Punch's Wobbly Rockets

NovaSilisko's Pack

Vaccer's Junk Parts pack

Corona688's Tuned SAS modules.

Edit: Derp, forgot my attachments
